jourdi2times: i’m new here on your page! my name is jourdi, i’m a white queer cis young adult woman (she/hers). i’m working towards being more present in my body every day, healing from my own hurts obvi, but also reckoning with and healing from what hurts i perpetuate on other folks and hearts and bodies with my whiteness, my cis-ness, my raised-middle-class-protestantness, and being honest with myself about that without detracting from how much i love and respect myself. your posts help me find that balance. i don’t know you or eb, but watching your stories i learn so much about what it looks and feels like to be supportive, thoughtful, and so so so so honest about the realities of human world life. thank yoooou

miss.sweets2019: I L0V3 this page, gurl, you need nothing more than just to be you😉🖖 I'm Samantha from Austin Texas yo🖖a stay at home mom/artist/singer/dancer/ writer😁😁😁 I do it all though I am totally feeling this page cause I can relate to an extent; like just being a woman/girl in general comes with a victim label SMH I've been through so much abuse from infancy to this very fuckn day, excuse my french but it's fucked yo😔 I still struggle trying to overcome my fears but fear just seems to never falter when you've been taken advantage of over and over from one person to the next throughout most your life and I'm just LITERALLY waiting for the next fucked up person to cause some sorta trauma like fuck every fuckn day i live with fear in anticipation, it's fucked & it ain't right so I admire & L0V3 people like you bringing awareness to our corrupt world🖖thank you for existing and being you yo🖖😁💜🦉
